verses.verse: בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁמִינִ֔י <WH8066> In the eighth בִּשְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> year שְׁתַּ֖יִם <WH8147> in the second לְדָרְיָ֑וֶשׁ <WH1867> of Darius הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> came the word יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to זְכַרְיָה֙ <WH2148> unto Zechariah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בֶּ֣רֶכְיָ֔ה <WH1296> of Berechiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עִדּ֥וֹ <WH5714> of Iddo הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> the prophet לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying
קָצַ֧ף <WH7107> displeased יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> The LORD עַל־ <WH5921> with אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1> with your fathers קָֽצֶף׃ <WH7110> hath been sore

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> Therefore say אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> to כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> thou unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> Turn אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ye unto me saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וְאָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> and I will turn אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH413> to you אָמַ֖ר <WH559> unto you saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּהְי֣וּ <WH1961> not be like כַאֲבֹֽתֵיכֶ֡ם <WH1> Be ye not as your fathers אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> to whom קָרְאֽוּ־ <WH7121> have cried אֲלֵיהֶם֩ <WH413> about הַנְּבִיאִ֨ים <WH5030> prophets הָרִֽאשֹׁנִ֜ים <WH7223> unto whom the former לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שׁ֤וּבוּ <WH7725> Turn נָא֙ <WH4994> now מִדַּרְכֵיכֶ֣ם <WH1870> ways הָרָעִ֔ים <WH7451> ye now from your evil [וּמַעֲלִילֵיכֶם כ] (וּמַֽעַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH4611> doing ק) הָֽרָעִ֑ים <WH7451> and [from] your evil וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not שָׁמְע֛וּ <WH8085> but they did not hear וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> or הִקְשִׁ֥יבוּ <WH7181> nor hearken אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me נְאֻם־ <WH5002> unto me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1> Your fathers אַיֵּה־ <WH346> where הֵ֑ם <WH1992> are they וְהַ֨נְּבִאִ֔ים <WH5030> where [are] they? and the prophets הַלְעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> alway יִֽחְיֽוּ׃ <WH2421> do they live

אַ֣ךְ ׀ <WH389> but דְּבָרַ֣י <WH1697> But my words וְחֻקַּ֗י <WH2706> and my statutes אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which צִוִּ֙יתִי֙ <WH6680> which I commanded אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבָדַ֣י <WH5650> my servants הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <WH5030> the prophets הֲל֥וֹא <WH3808> not הִשִּׂ֖יגוּ <WH5381> did they not take hold אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> fathers וַיָּשׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> break וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> and said כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which זָמַ֜ם <WH2161> thought יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Like as the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to do לָ֔נוּ כִּדְרָכֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH1870> unto us according to our ways וּכְמַ֣עֲלָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH4611> and according to our doings כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> so עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> so hath he dealt אִתָּֽנוּ׃ <WH854> for ס

בְּיוֹם֩ <WH3117> day עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> and twentieth וְאַרְבָּעָ֜ה <WH702> Upon the four לְעַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <WH6249> eleven עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> ten חֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH2320> month הוּא־ <WH1931> which חֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> which [is] the month שְׁבָ֔ט <WH7627> Sebat בִּשְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> year שְׁתַּ֖יִם <WH8147> in the second לְדָרְיָ֑וֶשׁ <WH1867> of Darius הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> came the word יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to זְכַרְיָה֙ <WH2148> unto Zechariah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בֶּ֣רֶכְיָ֔הוּ <WH1296> of Berechiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עִדּ֥וֹא <WH5714> of Iddo הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> the prophet לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

רָאִ֣יתִי ׀ <WH7200> I saw הַלַּ֗יְלָה <WH3915> by night וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold אִישׁ֙ <WH376> and behold a man רֹכֵב֙ <WH7392> riding עַל־ <WH5921> and ס֣וּס <WH5483> horse אָדֹ֔ם <WH122> upon a red וְה֣וּא <WH1931> and he עֹמֵ֔ד <WH5975> and he stood בֵּ֥ין <WH996> among הַהֲדַסִּ֖ים <WH1918> among the myrtle trees אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּמְּצֻלָ֑ה <WH4699> that [were] in the bottom וְאַחֲרָיו֙ <WH310> and behind סוּסִ֣ים <WH5483> horses אֲדֻמִּ֔ים <WH122> him [were there] red שְׂרֻקִּ֖ים <WH8320> speckled וּלְבָנִֽים׃ <WH3836> and white

וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> Then said מָה־ <WH4100> what אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> these אֲדֹנִ֑י <WH113> I O my lord וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> with me said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> about הַמַּלְאָךְ֙ <WH4397> what [are] these? And the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <WH1696> that talked בִּ֔י אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I אַרְאֶ֖ךָּ <WH7200> unto me I will shew מָה־ <WH4100> what הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> like אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וַיַּ֗עַן <WH6030> answered הָאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> And the man הָעֹמֵ֥ד <WH5975> that stood בֵּין־ <WH996> among הַהֲדַסִּ֖ים <WH1918> among the myrtle trees וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom שָׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> hath sent יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> These [are they] whom the LORD לְהִתְהַלֵּ֖ךְ <WH1980> to walk בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> to and fro through the earth

וַֽיַּעֲנ֞וּ <WH6030> And they answered אֶת־ <WH853> מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> the angel יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God הָֽעֹמֵד֙ <WH5975> that stood בֵּ֣ין <WH996> among הַהֲדַסִּ֔ים <WH1918> among the myrtle trees וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> and said הִתְהַלַּ֣כְנוּ <WH1980> We have walked to and fro בָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> through the earth וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold כָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> and behold all the earth יֹשֶׁ֥בֶת <WH3427> sitteth still וְשֹׁקָֽטֶת׃ <WH8252> and is at rest

וַיַּ֣עַן <WH6030> answered מַלְאַךְ־ <WH4397> Then the angel יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֹּאמַר֒ <WH559> and said יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַ֗י <WH4970> how אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no תְרַחֵ֣ם <WH7355> how long wilt thou not have mercy אֶת־ <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> on Jerusalem וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> and on the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which זָעַ֔מְתָּה <WH2194> against which thou hast had indignation זֶ֖ה <WH2088> these שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> these threescore and ten שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> whole age

וַיַּ֣עַן <WH6030> answered יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּלְאָ֛ךְ <WH4397> the angel הַדֹּבֵ֥ר <WH1696> that talked בִּ֖י דְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> words טוֹבִ֑ים <WH2896> with me [with] good דְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> words נִחֻמִֽים׃ <WH5150> [and] comfortable

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> with me said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> about הַמַּלְאָךְ֙ <WH4397> So the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <WH1696> that communed בִּ֔י קְרָ֣א <WH7121> unto me Cry לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> thou saying כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts קִנֵּ֧אתִי <WH7065> I am jealous לִירוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> for Jerusalem וּלְצִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> and for Zion קִנְאָ֥ה <WH7068> jealousy גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1419> with a great

וְקֶ֤צֶף <WH7110> sore גָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> And I am very אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I קֹצֵ֔ף <WH7107> displeased עַל־ <WH5921> with הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> with the heathen הַשַּֽׁאֲנַנִּ֑ים <WH7600> [that are] at ease אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I קָצַ֣פְתִּי <WH7107> displeased מְּעָ֔ט <WH4592> for I was but a little וְהֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> they עָזְר֥וּ <WH5826> and they helped לְרָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> forward the affliction

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD שַׁ֤בְתִּי <WH7725> I am returned לִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> to Jerusalem בְּֽרַחֲמִ֔ים <WH7356> with mercies בֵּיתִי֙ <WH1004> my house יִבָּ֣נֶה <WH1129> shall be built בָּ֔הּ נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> in it saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts [וְקָוָה כ] (וְקָ֥ו <WH6961> line ק) יִנָּטֶ֖ה <WH5186> shall be stretched forth עַל־ <WH5921> over יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> upon Jerusalem

ע֣וֹד ׀ <WH5750> Again קְרָ֣א <WH7121> Cry לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> yet saying כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts ע֛וֹד <WH5750> will again תְּפוּצֶ֥ינָה <WH6327> shall yet be spread abroad עָרַ֖י <WH5892> My cities מִטּ֑וֹב <WH2896> through prosperity וְנִחַ֨ם <WH5162> shall yet comfort יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> and the LORD עוֹד֙ <WH5750> will again אֶת־ <WH853> צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> Zion וּבָחַ֥ר <WH977> and shall yet choose ע֖וֹד <WH5750> and again בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> Jerusalem ס
וָאֶשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> Then lifted I up אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינַ֖י <WH5869> mine eyes וָאֵ֑רֶא <WH7200> and saw וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> and behold אַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> and behold four קְרָנֽוֹת׃ <WH7161> horns

וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> And I said אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמַּלְאָ֛ךְ <WH4397> unto the angel הַדֹּבֵ֥ר <WH1696> that talked בִּ֖י מָה־ <WH4100> What אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> These וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> with me What [be] these? And he answered אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about אֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> These הַקְּרָנוֹת֙ <WH7161> me These [are] the horns אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which זֵר֣וּ <WH2219> which have scattered אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel וִירוּשָׁלָֽם׃ <WH3389> and Jerusalem ס
וַיַּרְאֵ֣נִי <WH7200> shewed יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> me four חָרָשִֽׁים׃ <WH2796> carpenters

וָאֹמַ֕ר <WH559> Then said מָ֛ה <WH4100> What אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> are these בָאִ֖ים <WH935> I What come לַֽעֲשׂ֑וֹת <WH6213> these to do וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> ? And he spake לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These הַקְּרָנ֞וֹת <WH7161> These [are] the horns אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which זֵ֣רוּ <WH2219> which have scattered אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> Judah כְּפִי־ <WH6310> so that אִישׁ֙ <WH376> no man לֹא־ <WH3808> no נָשָׂ֣א <WH5375> did lift up רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <WH7218> his head וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <WH935> but these are come אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these לְהַחֲרִ֣יד <WH2729> to fray אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> לְיַדּ֞וֹת <WH3034> them to cast out אֶת־ <WH853> קַרְנ֣וֹת <WH7161> the horns הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> of the Gentiles הַנֹּשְׂאִ֥ים <WH5375> which lifted up קֶ֛רֶן <WH7161> [their] horn אֶל־ <WH413> against אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> over the land יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah לְזָרוֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH2219> to scatter ס
